body:
## Description
Error 'b is not a function' occurs when selecting provider configuration. Need to reset state and use apiService to fetch providers.

## Root Cause Analysis
- State management issue in provider configuration dialog
- Incorrect function binding or missing dependency
- API service not properly initialized
- Race condition in component lifecycle

## Technical Fix
1. Reset component state on dialog open
2. Ensure apiService is properly injected
3. Add error boundaries for better debugging
4. Implement proper loading states

## Code Changes Required
- Fix ProviderConfigDialog component
- Update state management logic
- Add proper error handling
- Implement retry mechanism

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Provider configuration dialog opens without errors
- [ ] All provider types load correctly
- [ ] Configuration forms render properly
- [ ] Form validation works as expected
- [ ] Save functionality persists settings
- [ ] Error messages are user-friendly
- [ ] Loading states show during API calls
- [ ] Component has proper error boundaries
- [ ] Unit tests cover error scenarios
- [ ] E2E tests verify full flow

## Testing Scenarios
1. Click configuration for each provider type
2. Test with slow network conditions
3. Test with API failures
4. Verify form validation
5. Test concurrent dialog opens

## Error Prevention
- Add TypeScript types for all props
- Implement proper null checks
- Add API response validation
- Use error boundaries
